name: Adventure of the Lobit
description:
Oh no! The evil Robits are here, and they've taken over with their evil ways, or something like that! It's time for us Lobits to get them out of here.

In this game, you play as a Lobit, a little cube that can temporarily change its size from its original. However, if they stay in a size unlike their own for too long, they will die. Use this mechanic to get around the puzzles, and defeat the Grand Robit!

This is my first game made with Godot, and also my first game jam! I had a lot of fun (and anxiety) with this. If anybody has any feedback they'd be willing to share, that'd be greatly appreciated.
